bug.short_desc: Failed Instalation of Installation of Graphical Modeling Framework runtime, tooling, and EMFT dependencies (2.0.1)

long_desc.thetext:
Build ID: M20071023-1652 Steps To Reproduce: 1.Download Eclipse 3.3.1.1 (eclipse-java-europa-fall2-win32.zip) 2.Find and Install --> Europa Discovery Site --> Models and Model Development --> GMF 2.0.1 (europa edition) --> Install 3.Error in installation: "Unable to complete action for feature "Graphical Modeling Framework (Europa Edition)" due to errors. The File "C:\DOCUME~1\JMARTINS\LOCALS~1\Temp\eclipse\.update\1199544546921\1199544546944\eclipse23274.tmp" is not a valid JAR file. [error in opening zip file] error in opening zip file The File "C:\DOCUME~1\JMARTINS\LOCALS~1\Temp\eclipse\.update\1199544546921\1199544546944\eclipse23274.tmp" is not a valid JAR file. [error in opening zip file] error in opening zip file" More information: Content of eclipse23274.tmp: Menu for /releases/europa/plugins/org.eclipse.gmf.map.edit_2.0.0.v20070809-0000.jar

Menu for /releases/europa/plugins/org.eclipse.gmf.map.edit_2.0.0.v20070809-0000.jar

[an internal server error occured]
Can you try another mirror, or install from the main Eclipse update site (last on the list)?
According to html content, it's some sort of server problem, trying once again should help. Please reopen if the problem persists.
[GMF Restructure] Bug 319140 : product GMF and component Releng was the original product and component for this bug
